use_case: Complete business automation for pressure washing businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Pressure Washing business owners, home services professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for pressure washing businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the pressure washing industry.
key_benefits: Industry-specific funnels for pressure washing services
Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Pressure Washing businesses wanting to automate operations
New pressure washing businesses needing a complete system
Established home services companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Pressure Washing Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Pressure Washing Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
